generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings and a crosswalk, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are clearly visible along the road and sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible on the sides of the road and in the background.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including pedestrian crossing signs and a 30 km/h speed limit sign.
- pole: Several poles are visible, supporting traffic signs and other equipment.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides.
- building: A building is visible in the background on the right side of the image.
